segments.text: I need help using the washer and dryer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me what the problem is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't figure out how to turn them on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't know I needed change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The washer costs 50 cents and the dryer costs a dollar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do I put the change ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The quarters go into the slot . You have to push the slot in , and the machine will turn on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that everything that I have to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I appreciate you helping me with this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you need anything else , just let me know .
segments.speaker: S2
